name: Webapp Testing
description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, capturing browser screenshots, and viewing browser logs.
longDescription: Test local web applications using Playwright without manual browser interaction. Ships with 3 Python examples: `element_discovery.py` for finding and inspecting DOM elements, `console_logging.py` for capturing browser console output, and `static_html_automation.py` for automating static HTML pages. Includes a server wrapper script (`with_server.py`) that starts your dev server, runs tests, and tears down cleanly. Covers screenshots, DOM inspection, form interaction, and browser log viewing for debugging frontend behavior programmatically.
